predictions.text: The LBMA Gold Price PM will fix at or above $2,600/oz on at least five days by 2025-09-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Count LBMA Gold Price PM fixes at or above $2,600 from 2025-09-02 through 2025-09-30 using the official LBMA/IBA daily publication. If there are five or more qualifying fix dates, this resolves true.
monitoring_signals: CME FedWatch probabilities for September/November cuts
CFTC COMEX gold net speculative positioning
predictions.rationale: Record-high prints, dovish Fed expectations, and geopolitical risk support repeated high LBMA PM fixes.

predictions.text: From 2025-09-02 close to 2025-09-30 close, BAE Systems plc (BA/ LN) will outperform the FTSE 100 Index (UKX) by at least 3.5 percentage points based on percentage change in adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compute percent change: [(BA/ LN adjusted close on 2025-09-30 ÷ 2025-09-02) − 1] − [(UKX close on 2025-09-30 ÷ 2025-09-02) − 1]. If the result ≥ 3.5 percentage points, resolve true.
monitoring_signals: Escalation in Russia-Ukraine or Red Sea tensions
predictions.rationale: Rearmament trend and fresh contracts support UK defense names outperforming a heavyweight, rate-sensitive FTSE 100.

predictions.text: From 2025-09-02 close to 2025-09-30 close, Ørsted A/S (ORSTED DC) will outperform the STOXX Europe 600 Utilities Index (SX6P) by at least 6.0 percentage points based on percentage change in adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compute percent change for ORSTED DC adjusted close and SX6P closing level between 2025-09-02 and 2025-09-30. If ORSTED’s change minus SX6P’s change ≥ 6.0 percentage points, resolve true.
monitoring_signals: EU/UK offshore wind policy and CfD announcements
Turbine supply-chain updates and CAPEX guidance
European power prices and forward curves
Company news on project impairments or equity raises
predictions.rationale: Strategic backing signals improving sentiment; sector peer index is weighed down by regulated utilities and rates sensitivity.

predictions.text: ICE EUA December-2025 futures will settle at or above €75.00 per metric ton on at least five trading days by 2025-09-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using ICE Endex official settlements for EUA Dec-2025, count trading days from 2025-09-02 to 2025-09-30 with settlement ≥ €75.00. If count ≥ 5, resolve true.
monitoring_signals: European gas (TTF) prices and storage data
EU ETS policy headlines and auction results
Speculative positioning and time spreads in EUAs
predictions.rationale: Rising power demand and climate risk narratives can firm EUA prices into early autumn.

predictions.text: ICE Brent front-month futures will settle at or above $95.00 per barrel at least once by 2025-10-15.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use ICE Futures Europe official daily settlement for the front-month Brent contract. Any settlement on or before 2025-10-15 ≥ $95.00 resolves true.
monitoring_signals: EIA weekly U.S. crude and product inventories
Dollar strength (DXY) and global growth data
predictions.rationale: Geopolitical risks and potential inventory draws can push Brent to test mid-90s into autumn.

predictions.text: From 2025-09-02 close to 2025-09-30 close, Novo Nordisk (NOVO-B DC) will outperform the STOXX Europe 600 Health Care Index (SXDP) by at least 4.0 percentage points based on percentage change in adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compute percent change for NOVO-B DC adjusted close and SXDP closing level between 2025-09-02 and 2025-09-30. If NOVO’s change minus SXDP’s change ≥ 4.0 percentage points, resolve true.
monitoring_signals: Label expansion and reimbursement developments for obesity drugs
Pricing/regulatory headlines in U.S. and EU
Supply capacity updates for GLP-1 products
predictions.rationale: Fresh cardiovascular benefit data reinforce Novo’s moat and can drive relative outperformance.

predictions.text: From 2025-09-02 close to 2025-09-30 close, Dollar General (DG) will underperform SPDR S&P Retail ETF (XRT) by at least 4.0 percentage points based on percentage change in adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compute percent change of DG and XRT adjusted closing prices between 2025-09-02 and 2025-09-30. If DG’s performance minus XRT’s performance ≤ −4.0 percentage points, resolve true.
monitoring_signals: SNAP policy implementation and state-level timing
Credit card delinquencies and subprime trends
predictions.rationale: SNAP cuts pressure lower-income spending, creating relative headwinds for deep-discounters versus diversified retail baskets.
